title: Somerville Flea!
content: I’ll have a booth at the Somerville Flea this summer. Stop by to see my art in person! Every Sunday from 10am - 4pm in the parking lot across from Orleans. Be there or be square!

title: New Painting!
content: I have a new painting in the works! I’m exploring mixed media and drawing inspiration from my time abroad in Japan. I cannot wait to share it with you all. Follow me on Tuiter to see the progress - @dtoliver_art
